namespace.description: The namespace in which the installation is defined.

created.description: The date created, as an ISO-8601 Extended Format date string, as specified in the ECMAScript standard

modified.description: The date modified, as an ISO-8601 Extended Format date string, as specified in the ECMAScript standard

bundle.description: A reference to where the bundle is published.

repository.description: The OCI repository of the current bundle definition, e.g. getporter/porter-hello

version.description: The current version of the bundle, e.g. 0.1.1. A leading v prefix is allowed.

digest.description: The current repository digest of the bundle, e.g. sha256:abc123

tag.description: The OCI tag of the current bundle definition, e.g. latest or v0.1.1

labels.description: Set of labels associated with the installation.

parameters.description: Parameters specified by the user through overrides. Sensitive values should be set via a parameter set.

parameterSets.description: Names of parameter sets to use with the installation.

credentialSets.description: Names of credential sets to use with the installation.

schemaType.description: The resource type of the current document.

schemaVersion.description: Version of the installation schema to which this document adheres
